nodes.long_description:
Laser Limbo est une compilation de jeux de combat en AR. Il transforme des maisons, bureaux ou étages entiers en des arènes multijoueurs uniques, utilisant parfaitement chaque mètre carré et contournant tous les obstacles.

Fonctionnalités :
- Petite campagne solo
- Mode PvP (similaire au Laser Tag)
- Mode coopératif vague
- Mode vague solo
- Mode chasse aux pièces et puzzle en PvP (sans armes)
- 3 joueurs (limité actuellement)*
- Vitesse des projectiles réglable
- Éditeur et gestionnaire de cartes
- Pièges laser
- Style pixel art rétro
- Interface utilisateur disponible en 7 langues

Feuille de route à court terme :
- Développement et affinage des fonctions multijoueurs
- Intégration des retours des joueurs

Feuille de route à moyen terme :
- Intégration de quêtes exclusives (Shared Spatial Anchor, scan de pièce, etc.)
- Développement de la campagne solo avec nouvelles mécaniques de jeu, ennemis, armes, boss et une histoire.

Nous sommes un petit studio indépendant basé à Berlin et nous serions ravis d’avoir vos retours.
Rejoignez notre canal Discord : https://discord.gg/T46nfPXebv

* Nous proposons également une version Enterprise qui prend en charge jusqu’à 8 joueurs. Contactez-nous sur Discord pour un accès temporaire si vous prévoyez une session de jeu plus grande. Nous travaillons également sur une solution permettant d’accueillir encore plus de joueurs.
nodes.short_description:
Laser Limbo est une compilation de jeux de combat en AR. Il transforme des maisons, bureaux ou étages entiers en des arènes multijoueurs AR uniques, utilisant parfaitement chaque mètre carré et contournant tous les obstacles.

Fonctionnalités :
- Petite campagne solo
- Jeu PvP
- Jeu coopératif en mode vague
- Mode vague solo
- Mode chasse aux pièces et puzzle en PvP (sans armes)
- 3 joueurs 
- Vitesse des projectiles réglable
- Éditeur et gestionnaire de cartes

Discord : https://discord.gg/T46n

nodes.long_description:
Laser Limbo is an AR battle game compilation. It transforms homes, offices, or entire floors into unique spatial multiplayer arenas that make perfect use of every square meter of space as they wrap around any obstacle.

Features:
- Small solo campaign
- PvP Shooter (Laser Tag like)
- Coop Wave Shooter
- Solo Wave Shooter
- PvP Coin Chase & Puzzle Mode (No Guns)
- 3 Player (currently limited)*
- Adjustable bullet speed
​​​- Map editor & manager
- Laser traps
- Retro pixel art style 
- UI available in 7 languages 

Short term road map
- Elaboration and polishing of the multiplayer functions
- Incorporation of player feedback

Mid term road map
- Incorporation of exclusive quest features (Shared Spatial Anchor, Room Scan etc.)
- Elaboration of the solo campaign. With new game mechanics, enemies, weapons and bosses and a storyline.

We're a small indie studio from Berlin and very happy for you feedback.
Please join our Discord channel: https://discord.gg/T46nfPXebv

* We also offer an Enterprise version that supports up to 8 players. Contact us on Discord for temporary access if you’re planning a larger game session. We are also working on a solution to accommodate more players in the near future.
nodes.short_description:
Laser Limbo is an AR battle game compilation. It transforms homes, offices, or entire floors into unique AR multiplayer arenas that make perfect use of every square meter of space as they wrap around any obstacle.

- Solo Wave Shooter

- 2 Player + 1 Spectator
- Adjustable bullet speed
​​​- Map editor & manager
- Laser traps
- Retro pixel art style 

Discord: https://discord.gg/T46nfPXebv

nodes.long_description:
Laser Limbo es una recopilación de juegos de batalla en AR. Transforma hogares, oficinas o pisos completos en arenas multijugador espaciales únicas que aprovechan al máximo cada metro cuadrado, adaptándose a cualquier obstáculo.

Características:
- Pequeña campaña en solitario
- Shooter PvP (similar a Laser Tag)
- Shooter cooperativo en oleadas
- Shooter en oleadas en solitario
- Modo PvP de caza de monedas y puzles (sin armas)
- 3 jugadores (limitado actualmente)*
- Velocidad de las balas ajustable
- Editor y gestor de mapas
- Trampas láser
- Estilo pixel art retro
- Interfaz disponible en 7 idiomas

Hoja de ruta a corto plazo:
- Desarrollo y perfeccionamiento de las funciones multijugador
- Incorporación del feedback de los jugadores

Hoja de ruta a medio plazo:
- Incorporación de características exclusivas de misión (Shared Spatial Anchor, escaneo de habitaciones, etc.)
- Desarrollo de la campaña en solitario con nuevas mecánicas de juego, enemigos, armas, jefes y una historia.

Somos un pequeño estudio indie de Berlín y estaríamos encantados de recibir tus comentarios.
Únete a nuestro canal de Discord: https://discord.gg/T46nfPXebv

* También ofrecemos una versión Enterprise que admite hasta 8 jugadores. Contáctanos en Discord para obtener acceso temporal si planeas una sesión de juego más grande. También estamos trabajando en una solución para admitir aún más jugadores en el futuro.

nodes.long_description:
Laser Limbo ist eine Sammlung von AR-Battle-Spielen. Es verwandelt Häuser, Büros oder ganze Etagen in einzigartige räumliche Multiplayer-Arenen, die jeden Quadratmeter optimal nutzen und sich um jedes Hindernis herum anpassen.

Features:
- Kleine Solo-Kampagne
- PvP-Shooter (ähnlich Laser Tag)
- Koop-Wave-Shooter
- Solo-Wave-Shooter
- PvP-Münzjagd & Puzzle-Modus (ohne Waffen)
- 3 Spieler (derzeit begrenzt)*
- Einstellbare Geschossgeschwindigkeit
- Karten-Editor & -Manager
- Laserfallen
- Retro-Pixel-Art-Stil
- Benutzeroberfläche in 7 Sprachen verfügbar

Kurzfristige Roadmap:
- Ausarbeitung und Verfeinerung der Multiplayer-Funktionen
- Einbindung von Spieler-Feedback

Mittelfristige Roadmap:
- Integration exklusiver Quest-Funktionen (Shared Spatial Anchor, Raum-Scan etc.)
- Ausarbeitung der Solo-Kampagne mit neuen Spielmechaniken, Gegnern, Waffen, Bossen und einer Handlung.

Wir sind ein kleines Indie-Studio aus Berlin und freuen uns sehr über dein Feedback.
Besuche unseren Discord-Kanal: https://discord.gg/T46nfPXebv

* Wir bieten auch eine Enterprise-Version an, die bis zu 8 Spieler unterstützt. Kontaktiere uns auf Discord, um vorübergehenden Zugang zu erhalten, falls du eine größere Spielsitzung planst. Wir arbeiten außerdem an einer Lösung, um in Zukunft mehr Spieler zu ermöglichen.

- Retro-Pixel-Art-Stil

Discord: https://d

nodes.long_description:
Laser Limbo è una raccolta di giochi di battaglia in AR. Trasforma case, uffici o interi piani in arene multiplayer uniche, sfruttando ogni metro quadrato e adattandosi a qualsiasi ostacolo.

Caratteristiche:
- Piccola campagna in solitario
- Shooter PvP (simile a Laser Tag)
- Shooter cooperativo a ondate
- Shooter a ondate in solitario
- Modalità PvP Caccia alle Monete e Puzzle (senza armi)
- 3 giocatori (attualmente limitati)*
- Velocità dei proiettili regolabile
- Editor e gestore di mappe
- Trappole laser
- Stile pixel art retrò
- Interfaccia utente disponibile in 7 lingue

Roadmap a breve termine:
- Elaborazione e perfezionamento delle funzioni multiplayer
- Incorporazione del feedback dei giocatori

Roadmap a medio termine:
- Integrazione di funzioni esclusive (Shared Spatial Anchor, scansione degli ambienti, ecc.)
- Sviluppo della campagna in solitario con nuove meccaniche, nemici, armi, boss e una trama.

Siamo un piccolo studio indie di Berlino e siamo felici di ricevere i tuoi feedback.
Unisciti al nostro canale Discord: https://discord.gg/T46nfPXebv

* Offriamo anche una versione Enterprise che supporta fino a 8 giocatori. Contattaci su Discord per accesso temporaneo se stai pianificando una sessione più grande. Stiamo lavorando a una soluzione per consentire ancora più giocatori.
nodes.short_description:
Laser Limbo è una raccolta di giochi di battaglia in AR. Trasforma case, uffici o interi piani in arene multiplayer AR uniche, utilizzando perfettamente ogni metro quadrato e adattandosi a qualsiasi ostacolo.

Caratteristiche:
- Piccola campagna in solitario
- Shooter PvP
- Shooter cooperativo a ondate
- Shooter a ondate in solitario
- Modalità PvP Caccia alle Monete e Puzzle (senza armi)
- 3 giocatori
- Velocità dei proiettili regolabile

Discord: https://discord.gg/T46nfPXebv

nodes.long_description:
Laser Limbo é uma coleção de jogos de batalha em AR. Ele transforma casas, escritórios ou andares inteiros em arenas multiplayer únicas, aproveitando ao máximo cada metro quadrado e contornando qualquer obstáculo.

Características:
- Pequena campanha solo
- Shooter PvP (semelhante a Laser Tag)
- Shooter cooperativo em ondas
- Shooter em ondas solo
- Modo PvP Caça a Moedas e Quebra-Cabeça (sem armas)
- 3 jogadores (atualmente limitado)*
- Velocidade dos projéteis ajustável
- Editor e gerenciador de mapas
- Armadilhas de laser
- Estilo pixel art retrô
- Interface disponível em 7 idiomas

Roteiro de curto prazo:
- Aperfeiçoamento das funções multiplayer
- Integração do feedback dos jogadores

Roteiro de médio prazo:
- Integração de funções exclusivas (Shared Spatial Anchor, escaneamento de sala, etc.)
- Desenvolvimento da campanha solo com novas mecânicas, inimigos, armas, chefes e uma história.

Somos um pequeno estúdio indie de Berlim e adoraríamos receber seu feedback.
Junte-se ao nosso canal no Discord: https://discord.gg/T46nfPXebv

* Também oferecemos uma versão Enterprise que suporta até 8 jogadores. Entre em contato no Discord para acesso temporário se estiver planejando uma sessão de jogo maior. Estamos trabalhando em uma solução para permitir ainda mais jogadores no futuro.
nodes.short_description:
Laser Limbo é uma coleção de jogos de batalha em AR. Ele transforma casas, escritórios ou andares inteiros em arenas multiplayer únicas, aproveitando ao máximo cada metro quadrado e contornando qualquer obstáculo.

Características:

- Editor e gerenciador de mapas

Discord: https://discord.gg/T46nfPXebv

nodes.long_description:
Laser Limbo is een verzameling AR-gevechtsspellen. Het transformeert huizen, kantoren of volledige verdiepingen in unieke ruimtelijke multiplayerarena's die elke vierkante meter optimaal benutten en zich aanpassen aan elk obstakel.

Functies:
- Kleine solocampagne
- PvP-shooter (vergelijkbaar met Laser Tag)
- Coöp wave shooter
- Solo wave shooter
- PvP-muntenjacht en puzzelmodus (geen wapens)
- 3 spelers (momenteel beperkt)*
- Aanpasbare kogel snelheid
- Kaarteneditor en -beheerder
- Laser vallen
- Retro pixel art stijl
- UI beschikbaar in 7 talen

Kortetermijnroadmap:
- Verbeteren en verfijnen van multiplayerfuncties
- Integreren van spelersfeedback

Middellangetermijnroadmap:
- Integratie van exclusieve missiefuncties (Shared Spatial Anchor, kamer scan, etc.)
- Uitbreiden van de solocampagne met nieuwe spelmechanieken, vijanden, wapens, bazen en een verhaal.

We zijn een kleine indie-studio uit Berlijn en staan open voor jouw feedback.
Doe mee op ons Discord-kanaal: https://discord.gg/T46nfPXebv

* We bieden ook een Enterprise-versie aan die tot 8 spelers ondersteunt. Neem contact met ons op via Discord voor tijdelijke toegang als je een grotere sessie plant. We werken ook aan een oplossing voor meer spelers in de toekomst.
nodes.short_description:
Laser Limbo is een verzameling AR-gevechtsspellen. Het transformeert huizen, kantoren of volledige verdiepingen in unieke AR-multiplayerarena's die elke vierkante meter optimaal benutten en zich aanpassen aan elk obstakel.

Functies:
- Kleine solocampagne
- PvP-shooter
- Coöp wave shooter
- Solo wave shooter
- PvP-muntenjacht en puzzelmodus (geen wapens)
- 2 spelers + 1 toeschouwer
- Aanpasbare kogel snelheid
- Kaarteneditor en -beheerder
- Laser vallen

Discord: https://discord.gg/T46nfPXebv

nodes.long_description:
Laser Limbo is an augmented reality focused multiplayer game. It transforms every room into a game world through the associated level editor. The players see the real environment via video through the VR glasses, but this is enhanced by virtual game elements (Passthrough AR).
The art style of the game is based on 90s 3D pixel graphics and gives a rather playful impression. Martial and realistic depictions are deliberately avoided. 
The game element that connects the different game modes are laser beam traps (as known from agent films). The players have to move carefully and skilfully through the room so as not to trigger the traps. They wear waistcoats in game colours that explode when they leave the game.
nodes.short_description: Laser Limbo is an augmented reality multiplayer game that turns any room into a gaming world with a level editor. Using VR glasses, players see their real environment enhanced with virtual elements in a 90s 3D pixel art style. The game avoids martial and realistic depictions and features laser beam traps from various game modes. Players navigate skillfully to avoid triggering traps and wear game-colored waistcoats that explode upon leaving the game.

nodes.change_log: "With this update, Laser Limbo can now be played with the new StrikerVR Haptic Gun Controller. The game and the entire UI can now be operated almost single-handedly. For more information, visit our Discord: https://www.freeroam.ar/discord"
